summary:
WORK EXPERIENCE

Technical Sales Manager | HUESKER Synthetic B.V.
03-2022 - current


Sales Manager | Vrijenban Concrete Industries
03-2016  -  02-2022
Vrijenban is a specialist in the production of project specific prefabricated concrete elements. In my current role I oversee all key business accounts in the Netherlands. These business accounts vary from architects, contractors and (semi) government agencies. Also involved in sourcing personell, engineering and raw materials. I report to my Managing Director and stockholder.

Regional Account Manager | Bylandt BV
11-2013 – 02-2016
Bylandt is a producer of Clay baked pavement. Accountable for all business accounts of the Northern Netherlands region. These accounts include (semi) government, architects, engineering and contractors. Sparring partner of MD with regard to creating account plans and market strategy.

Key Account Manager | Flexoplast / Clondalkin Flexibles
01-2009 – 10-2013
Flexoplast develops and produces printed and unprinted packaging films for FMCG as well as for industrial applications. I was responsable for Clondalkin intercompany partners. Additionally I was responsable for the PMC’s Pet Food, insulation and hygiene industry. In this role familiar with blown extrusion, high barrier films, convection and flexo printing. 

Rayon Manager | Feikema BV
2004 – 2008
Trading company. Aquisition, sales and sourcing of high quality pavement materials (clay pavement, natural stone, drainage pavement and line drainage systems). Maintaining and expanding our network of national and international suppliers which were mostly located in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany. Mentoring colleagues in other sales regions. My sales region was local: provence of Friesland in the Netherlands.

Regional Account Manager | Bylandt BV
2002 - 2004
Accountable for all business accounts of the Northern Netherlands region. 

Sales department | Prins Dokkum BV
1995 - 2002
Prins Dokkum was a steel producing supplier of road safety systems, greenhouses and rims/wheels. Initially started as office staf on our sales department and later became accountmanager for road safety systems (NL and Germany in Niedersachsen area).

 	PERSONAL
•	Date of birth: 27-05-1970
•	Marital status: Married, 2 daughters
•	Nationality: Dutch
•	Hobbies:	Running, motorcycling, animals

profile_positions.description:
HUESKER is een innovatieve engineer en producent van geokunststoffen voor civieltechnische toepassing, waaronder geotechniek, grondwerk en funderingstechniek, wegen en verharding, milieutechniek, recycling en waterbouw.

Visit us at www.HUESKER.nl
profile_positions.title: Technische verkoop

profile_positions.description:
Vrijenban Betonindustrie is een gespecialiseerde betonfabriek voor geprefabriceerde betonelementen. Onze specialiteit is maatwerk: bijzonder gevormde elementen in elke gewenste milieuklasse. 
Wij produceren prefab beton voor Grond-, Weg- en Waterbouw (GWW), rail, utiliteitsbouw en civiele werken. Vanuit onze fabrieken in Delft, Vianen en Zuidbroek zijn wij toeleverancier voor gemeenten, provincies, architecten en aannemers

Wat door opdrachtgevers en architecten wordt bedacht, maken wij mogelijk. Enkele voorbeelden: Putten en (kabel)goten, geprefabriceerde elementen voor bruggen en viaducten, kunst, wandpanelen, geluidschermen, Steigers, trap- en zitelementen, parkbanden, poeren.

Als sales manager verantwoordelijk voor alle business accounts in Nederland.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Vrijenban Prefab Industries is a dedicated and specialized producer for prefabricated concrete elements. Our specialty is customization: special formed elements in any environmental class .
We produce prefabricated concrete elements for road contractors, hydraulic engineers, rail construction and civil works. From our production locations in Delft, Vianen and Zuidbroek, we supply municipalities, provinces, architects and contractors

Whatever designed by clients and architects: we make it happen in prefabricated concrete. Some examples: Pits and (cable) gutters, prefabricated elements for bridges and viaducts , art, wall panels, fences, piers, stairs and seating elements, park bands etc. etc...

In my role as sales manager I oversee business accounts in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
CRH Landscaping is Europees marktleider op diverse gebieden, waaronder landscaping. Een van de business units is Bylandt straatbaksteen.

De straatbaksteen is 'ons' leven. Enerzijds door de beleving van onze medewerkers als het gaat om de productie van een kwalitatief hoogwaardig product, anderzijds door het gevoel van vertrouwdheid die straatbaksteen oproept binnen onze leefomgeving. Bylandt Straatbaksteen speelt als betrouwbare leverancier van kwalitatieve en vernieuwende straatbakstenen een actieve rol in de bouwketen. Vanuit een lange traditie van inventiviteit zijn we inspirator voor creatieve geesten en opdrachtgevers. Wij produceren niet alleen producten, maar denken ook graag mee als het gaat om uitdagende verwerkingsvraagstukken.

Verantwoordelijk voor alle business accounts in Noord Nederland. 

Voorbeelden: (semi) overheid, architecten, ingenieursbureaus en aannemers.

CRH Landscaping have European market leader positions in among others paving products. One of the Business units of landscaping are Bylandt Straatbaksteen.
 
Clay baked paving is 'our' life. Partly due to the experience of our employees when it comes to producing high quality products, but also by the feeling of familiarity that clay street brick evoke within our environment. Bylandt Paving Brick play an active role in the construction chain as a reliable supplier of quality and innovative pavers . From a long tradition of inventiveness we are a source of inspiration for creative professionals and clients. We produce not only products, but also like to play an active role when it comes to challenging accounting issues.

In my role as regional account manager, I oversee all business accounts for the Northern Netherlands region. 

Accounts: (semi) government, architects, engineering, contractors.
profile_positions.title: Regional Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Flexoplast develops and produces printed and unprinted packaging films for the Fast Moving Consumer Market (FMCG) as well as for industrial applications.

As specialist in Flexible Packaging we are part of the Clondalkin Group with a main focus on the engineering and production of packaging films. Our customers are operating in various markets, mainly in consumer goods and industrial applications.

Responsable for business with Clondalkin intercompany partners, as well as key accounts in among others insulation and hygiene industry.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager

profile_positions.description: Acquisitie, verkoop en inkoop van hoogwaardige elementenverharding voor de professionele markt in de provincie Friesland. Voorbeelden: gebakken straatstenen, waterdoorlatende bestratingsystemen, lijnafwatering, hoogwaardige betonproducten, natuursteen. Onderhouden netwerk nationale en internationale leveranciers/producenten, voornamelijk in Nederland, Duitsland en België. Begeleiding en advies collega buitendienstmedewerkers.  Sparringpartner  directie
profile_positions.title: Rayon Manager

profile_positions.description: Acquisitie en verkoop gebakken straatstenen in de provincies Friesland, Groningen, Drenthe, Noordoostpolder, Noord Holland en kop Overijssel. Werkterreinen: (semi) overheid, ingenieursbureaus, architecten, aannemers, projectontwikkelaars.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description: Aanvankelijk technisch medewerker binnendienst (afdeling Verkeersveiligheidssystemen). Acquisitie en verkoop Buitendienst. Werkterreinen: Overheid, Ingenieursbureaus en aannemers in geheel Nederland alsmede verkooprayon Niedersachsen (Dld).
profile_positions.title: sales representative
